instruction: Analyze the given article to identify the main points.
input:
The article is titled "The Benefits of Working From Home"
The Benefits of Working From Home

Working from home is quickly becoming the preferred option for many professionals for a wide range of reasons. For starters, not having to commute to a central office means more time for yourself, saving money as you don’t have to buy food, outfits, and transportation to go to work. It’s also a great way to stay home with your kids but still maintain your professional career, as well as the added convenience of the numerous digital platforms that allow for remote working.
output:
The primary points in the article "The Benefits of Working From Home" can be summarized as follows:
- Working from home provides more time and may save money as there is no need to purchase food, clothes, and transportation to work. 
- It is also a great option for parents who want to stay at home with their kids and still keep their professional career.
- Remote working is made possible by the numerous digital platforms that allow for remote working.
